ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend this class for students who are in a PhD program or seriously interested in pursuing graduate studies at the PhD level. Expect to read approximately 3 articles per week. The midterm is to write a 2 page single-spaced paper and give a 15-minute presentation. The final is to write a 10-15 page paper and give a 50-minute presentation.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course definitely gave me insight into how research is conducted in the marketing/psychology domain. More importantly, it taught me how to IMPROVE my research methodology.

This class topic was among the most important I've taken. if the course assignments were related to our own research, it would have contributed more directly to our research - but overall the topic and ideas were exactly what we need to learn -
